= Index Supported Environ variable

== Http Configuration

|===
|Env Var name| Type| Doc| Version Supported

|HTTP_ENABLE| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_bool[Bool]| xref:converters/http.adoc#option_http_enable[http_enable]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|HTTP_INTERFACE| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/http.adoc#option_http_interface[http_interface]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|HTTP_PORT| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[Int]| xref:converters/http.adoc#option_http_port[http_port]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|PROXY_MODE| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_bool[Bool]| xref:converters/http.adoc#option_proxy_mode[proxy_mode]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|X_SENDFILE| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_bool[Bool]| xref:converters/http.adoc#option_x_sendfile[x_sendfile]| Supported Odoo version from 16.0 until 19.0
|===

== Database Configuration

|===
|Env Var name| Type| Doc| Version Supported

|DB_NAME| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_name[db_name]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_HOST| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_host[db_host]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_PORT| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[Int]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_port[db_port]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_USER| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_user[db_user]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_PASSWORD| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_password[db_password]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_APP_NAME| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_app_name[db_app_name]| Only Odoo version 19.0 is supported
|DB_MAX_CONN| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[Int]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_maxconn[db_maxconn]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_REPLICA_HOST| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_replica_host[db_replica_host]| Supported Odoo version from 18.0 until 19.0
|DB_REPLICA_PORT| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[Int]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_replica_port[db_replica_port]| Supported Odoo version from 18.0 until 19.0
|DB_TEMPLATE| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_template[db_template]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_SSL_MODE| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_enum[Enum]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_db_sslmode[db_sslmode]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|LIST_DB| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_bool[Bool]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_list_db[list_db]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|DB_FILTER| xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[String]| xref:converters/database.adoc#option_dbfilter[dbfilter]| Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0
|===
